multimonster.common.resource
Interface ResourceWaiter

All Known Subinterfaces:
EditFacade
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditHandler, EditImplBean
public interface ResourceWaiter

A component which wants to reqeust resources in a asynchronous whay needs to implement this interface. It's used to inform the requesting component wether and when the request was successfull.

Author:
Holger Velke (sihovelk)

Method Summary
 void denyResource(ResourceRequestIdentifier rrId)
          called if no resources could be granted within the maximum wait time
 void grantResource(ResourceRequestIdentifier rrId)
          called if the resources are granted within the maximum wait time
 

Method Detail

grantResource

Parameters:
rrId - the id of the request

denyResource

public void denyResource(ResourceRequestIdentifier rrId)
called if no resources could be granted within the maximum wait time

Parameters:
rrId - the id of the request
